announcements.title: Road Update: Pothole Fixed
announcements.summary:
**Summary of Government Report: "Road Update: Pothole Fixed"**  
**Report ID:** issue-046 | **Location:** 8300 Inwood Road, Dallas, TX 75209  

The City of Dallas has resolved the pothole issue reported on Inwood Road (Report ID: issue-046), which had caused water accumulation and drainage problems during rain events. The repair work has been completed, restoring proper drainage and eliminating the hazard.  

Citizens are advised that the area is now safe for travel, and the drainage system is functioning as intended. No further action is required from residents. For ongoing concerns or additional reports, contact the Cityâ€™s Public Works Department.  

This update addresses the original citizen-submitted issue (Report ID: issue-046) and confirms the problem has been resolved. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
